 2004-09602004-09-01,  JUS,  ,  , 
ActContraventions Act
PrecisRegulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS by designating a number of new offences under the Boating Restriction Regulations, the Small Vessel Regulations and the Competency of Operators of Pleasure Craft Regulations as contraventions or by updating the short-form descriptions of several existing ones, and by correcting a reference to the fine associated with an offence under the Collision Regulations.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2004-0189 Publication Date: 2004-09-22
AttachmentsAttachment
precis: Regulations Amending the CONTRAVENTIONS REGULATIONS by designating a number of new offences under the Boating Restriction Regulations, the Small Vessel Regulations and the Competency of Operators of Pleasure Craft Regulations as contraventions or by updating the short-form descriptions of several existing ones, and by correcting a reference to the fine associated with an offence under the Collision Regulations.
